sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import data from '../data' import { productDetailsReducer } from '../reducers/productReducers'; export default function ProductScreen(props) { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const productDetails = useSelector(state => state.productDetails); const {loading, error, product} = productDetails; return (
{loading ? : error ? {error} :
Back to Result

  • {product.name}

  • Price: ${product.price}
  • Description:

    {product.description}

  • Price
    {product.price}
  • Status
    {product.countInStock>0 ?( In Stock ):( Out of Stock )}
}
) }
